TITLE GOES HERE: Consult the documentation for `CPS85` in the `r pkg_macro(mosaicData)` package to determine the meaning of CPS.

<!--begin-answer-->
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(mosaicData)
?CPS85
```
We see that CPS stands for current population survey.
